MATERIAL PACK2 FEATURES
colorMapName:           50% ambient + 50% diffuse                       ALWAYS ON
normalMapName:          NEED TO BE SPECIFIED MORE CLEAR                 OFF             ON
specularFactor:         FAT to color factor, strength factor            OFF <0.001      ON >= 0.001
+ glossinessFactor:     FAT to color factor, exponent
reflectionFactor:       replaces color with cubemap color * factor      OFF <0.001      ON >= 0.001
2 sided texture
